mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_violation (tvis_json_id, vehs_idx, camera_id, hphm, csys, clpp, ppcx, cxnk, psfx, clwz, wzlx, image_hash, create_time) VALUES (#{tvisJsonId}, #{vehsIdx}, #{CameraId}, #{hphm}, #{csysName}, #{clppName}, #{ppcxName}, #{cxnkName}, #{psfx}, #{clwz}, #{wzlx}, #{imageHash}, #{date})
